neurotools.stats.history_basis module¶

neurotools.stats.history_basis.history_basis(K=5, tstop=100, scale=10, normalize=0)[source]¶

K: number of basis elements tstop: length of time to cover scale: affects how “logarithmic” basis scaling looks normalize: normalize bases to unit or not?

>>> plot(basis.T)
normalization not implemented
